plot: This film answers the question that has plagued movie fans for years: what would "Star Wars" would have looked like if Quentin Tarantino had directed it using action figures and a Macintosh computer?
title: Quentin Tarantino's Star Wars
plot_es: This film answers the question that has plagued movie fans for years: what would "Star Wars" would have looked like if Quentin Tarantino had directed it using action figures and a Macintosh computer?
plot_en: This film answers the question that has plagued movie fans for years: what would "Star Wars" would have looked like if Quentin Tarantino had directed it using action figures and a Macintosh computer?
